00018         const construct_attribute* activator::find_ctor(const type &t, const type* argv[], size_t argc)
00019         {
00020                 for(type::attribute_iterator it = t.attributes_begin(),
00021                         end = t.attributes_end();
00022                         it != end; ++it)
00023                 {
00024                         if(it->get_type() != ATTR_CONSTRUCTION)
00025                                 continue;
00026                         
00027                         const construct_attribute* ca = static_cast<const construct_attribute*>(&*it);
00028                         if(suitable_params(ca->ctor_type(), argv, argc))
00029                                 return ca;
00030                 }
00031                 return 0;
00032         }
00033 
00035 
00036         void* activator::create_instance(const type& t, value_type_pair argv[], size_t argc)
00037         {
00038                 const type* argv_t[DELEG_MAX_INVOKE_PARAMS];
00039                 void* argv_i[DELEG_MAX_INVOKE_PARAMS];
00040 
00041                 for(size_t i = 0; i != argc; ++i)
00042                 {
00043                         argv_t[i] = argv[i].Type;
00044                         argv_i[i] = argv[i].Value;
00045                 }
00046 
00047                 const construct_attribute* ctor = find_ctor(t, argv_t, argc);
00048                 if(!ctor)
00049                         return 0;
00050                 return ctor->create_instance(argv_i);
00051         }
00052 
00054 
00055         void activator::destroy_instance(const type& t, void* inst)
00056         {
00057                 for(type::attribute_iterator it = t.attributes_begin(),
00058                         end = t.attributes_end();
00059                         it != end; ++it)
00060                 {
00061                         if(it->get_type() != ATTR_CONSTRUCTION)
00062                                 continue;
00063 
00064                         const construct_attribute* ca = static_cast<const construct_attribute*>(&*it);
00065                         ca->destroy_instance(inst);
00066                         break;
00067                 }
00068         }
00069 
00071 
00072         bool activator::suitable_params(const function_type &ft, const type* argv[], size_t argc)
00073         {
00074                 size_t fargc = ft.argument_count();
00075                 if(fargc != argc)
00076                         return false;
00077 
00078                 type** fargv = ft.argument_types();
00079 
00080                 for(size_t i = 0; i != argc; ++i)
00081                         if(!fargv[i]->equal(argv[i]))
00082                                 return false;
00083 
00084                 return true;
00085         }
